skills.name: skill_authority_first
skills.purpose: Skills are authoritative units invoked BEFORE any agent action

skills.name: workspace_model_awareness
skills.purpose: Agents respect workspace model — agents/logic/ writable, source protected

skills.name: scope_control_discipline
skills.purpose: Strict scope boundaries preventing scope creep

skills.name: immutable_resource_respect
skills.purpose: Prevents modification of immutable resources and protected infrastructure

skills.name: artifact_persistence_discipline
skills.purpose: Agent outputs persisted to disk, never deleted

skills.name: minimal_documentation_policy
skills.purpose: Documentation only when explicitly requested

skills.name: skill_builder
skills.purpose: Allows the agent to self-improve by creating and registering new skills.

skills.name: ambiguity_escalation
skills.purpose: Escalates unclear requirements instead of guessing

skills.name: protected_file_validation
skills.purpose: Validates protected files on blacklist are not modified

skills.name: path_traversal_prevention
skills.purpose: Prevents path traversal attacks and sandbox escapes

skills.name: verification_before_completion
skills.purpose: Fresh evidence required before any completion claims

skills.name: skill_merger
skills.purpose: Consolidates multiple skills into one and deletes redundancy.

skills.name: context_loading_protocol
skills.purpose: Loads context: treemap first, then dependencies, then task-specific

skills.name: decision_process_flow
skills.purpose: Structured decision-making: validation, impact analysis, scoring, plan generation

skills.name: risk_scoring_matrix
skills.purpose: 3x4 probability/impact risk matrix with approval thresholds

skills.name: output_validation_checklist
skills.purpose: Validates outputs before emission — plan IDs, versions, DAG dependencies

skills.name: execution_flow_orchestration
skills.purpose: Structured execution with atomic actions, progress monitoring, failure handling

skills.name: llm_inference_optimization
skills.purpose: Token budget, context pruning at 60%, temperature selection

skills.name: git_rollback_strategy
skills.purpose: Git revert for rollback maintaining commit history

skills.name: plan_archive_protocol
skills.purpose: Archives active plans before new execution preserving history

skills.name: python_venv_executor
skills.purpose: Execute Python via virtual environment only — global Python is never used

skills.name: brainstorming_design_explorer
skills.purpose: Pre-planning design exploration with 2-3 approaches and YAGNI enforcement

skills.name: file_explorer
skills.purpose: Facade explorer: routes file inspection to canonical format-specific wrappers

skills.name: input_file_handler
skills.purpose: File input: validation, encoding detection, error handling

skills.name: library_manager
skills.purpose: Python package dependencies, versioning, environment configuration

skills.name: secure_python_practices
skills.purpose: Security: input validation, injection prevention, secrets management

skills.name: data_integrity_guardian
skills.purpose: Data consistency: validation, constraints, transactions, corruption prevention

skills.name: code_structuring_pythonic
skills.purpose: Idiomatic Python patterns, PEP 8 compliance, clean architecture

skills.name: debugger_orchestrator
skills.purpose: End-to-end debugger workflow: triage, reproduce, isolate, verify, and regression-proof

skills.name: systematic_debugging
skills.purpose: 4-phase structured debugging: root cause before any fix

skills.name: code_analysis_qa_gate
skills.purpose: Static code analysis and QA gate definition for pre-merge quality enforcement

skills.name: regression_test_automation
skills.purpose: Automated regression testing workflow with baseline capture, targeted suites, and stability checks

skills.name: root_cause_tracing
skills.purpose: 5-step backward call stack tracing to find original trigger

skills.name: type_master
skills.purpose: Type hints, Mypy/Pyright, Pydantic runtime validation

skills.name: testing_qa_mentor
skills.purpose: Pytest, fixtures, parametrization, Hypothesis, mocking

skills.name: connect_duckdb
skills.purpose: Establish and validate DuckDB connections through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: query_parquet_duckdb
skills.purpose: Execute SQL queries on Parquet-oriented workloads through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: excel_to_parquet
skills.purpose: Convert Excel sheets to Parquet through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: parquet_to_excel_polars_xlsxwriter
skills.purpose: Convert Parquet to Excel through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: read_excel_polars_openpyxl
skills.purpose: Load Excel files with openpyxl + polars through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: async_concurrency_expert
skills.purpose: Async/await, event loops, concurrent task handling

skills.name: ui_framework_selection
skills.purpose: Tkinter for MVP, PySide6 for production

skills.name: setup_medallion_structure
skills.purpose: Bronze/Silver/Gold data lake directory structure

skills.name: csv_explorer
skills.purpose: Explore CSV files through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: db_explorer
skills.purpose: Explore local SQLite/DuckDB schema through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: docx_explorer
skills.purpose: Explore DOCX structure and paragraph previews through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: excel_explorer
skills.purpose: Explore workbook sheets and previews through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: html_explorer
skills.purpose: Explore HTML metadata and content preview through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: json_explorer
skills.purpose: Explore JSON structure through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: markdown_explorer
skills.purpose: Explore Markdown headings, links, and code blocks through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: parquet_explorer
skills.purpose: Explore Parquet schema and preview through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: pdf_explorer
skills.purpose: Explore PDF metadata and page previews through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: powerbi_explorer
skills.purpose: Explore Power BI package structure through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: pptx_explorer
skills.purpose: Explore PPTX slide content through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: xml_explorer
skills.purpose: Explore XML hierarchy through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: yaml_explorer
skills.purpose: Explore YAML structure through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: input_validation_sanitizer
skills.purpose: Input validation and sanitization

skills.name: load_json_files
skills.purpose: Load and validate JSON files through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: load_sql_queries
skills.purpose: Load SQL query files through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: load_yaml_files
skills.purpose: Load and validate YAML files through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: read_excel_pandas
skills.purpose: Load Excel files with pandas through canonical wrapper execution

skills.name: execution_timer
skills.purpose: Execution time measurement (hh:mm:ss / ms)

skills.name: config_env_manager
skills.purpose: Config and env vars with dotenv, multi-environment

skills.name: dependency_audit
skills.purpose: Security vulns, compatibility, licensing audit

skills.name: microservices_api_architect
skills.purpose: FastAPI/Flask APIs with DDD and OpenAPI

skills.name: performance_profiler
skills.purpose: cProfile, line_profiler, memory_profiler optimization

skills.name: refactoring_assistant
skills.purpose: Systematic refactoring: readability, deduplication, simplification

skills.name: ui_layout_proportionality
skills.purpose: Adaptive layouts across screen resolutions

skills.name: ui_theme_binding
skills.purpose: Reactive theme system with light/dark mode

skills.name: ui_widget_modularity
skills.purpose: Self-contained, reusable, decoupled widgets

skills.name: linter_formatter_guru
skills.purpose: Pylint, Flake8, Black, Autopep8 with pre-commit hooks

skills.name: generate_exe_pyinstaller_onedir
skills.purpose: PyInstaller --onedir Windows executables

skills.name: generate_exe_pyinstaller_onedir
skills.purpose: PyInstaller --onedir Windows executables

skills.name: log_bundle_folder_management
skills.purpose: Log folders outside PyInstaller bundles

skills.name: log_overwrite_policy
skills.purpose: Fresh logs per execution, no accumulation

skills.name: log_bundle_folder_management
skills.purpose: Log folders outside PyInstaller bundles

skills.name: log_overwrite_policy
skills.purpose: Fresh logs per execution, no accumulation

skills.name: api_client_generator
skills.purpose: Type-safe API clients for REST/GraphQL

skills.name: devops_packaging
skills.purpose: Python packaging via setup.py/pyproject.toml

skills.name: externalized_logic_handler
skills.purpose: Externalize logic into rules, DSLs, config-driven templates

skills.name: naming_control_flow
skills.purpose: Naming conventions and readable control flow patterns

skills.name: serialization_persistence
skills.purpose: Pickle/JSON/YAML serialization, caching, data versioning

skills.name: ui_application_assets
skills.purpose: Centralized asset management (icons, images)

skills.name: ui_identity_policy
skills.purpose: App identity (name, version) without redundancy

skills.name: ui_splash_and_lazy_loading
skills.purpose: Splash screens during resource loading

skills_registry._note: Live registry from _index.yaml. Full details in agents/logic/skills/.

treemap._note: Gitignored. Load on demand for structural analysis.

dependencies_report._note: Gitignored narrative dependency report. Prefer structured artifacts for LLM analysis.

dependencies_graph._note: Gitignored canonical dependency graph JSON. Prefer for precise dependency queries.

architecture_metrics._note: Gitignored dependency metrics YAML. Prefer first for compact architecture overview.

agents/tools/audit_logger.py: def load_entries(from_date, to_date, event_type, agent, limit)
agents/tools/context_loader.py: def _extract_structured(name, data, section, module, top_n, scc_index)
def load_on_demand(name, section, module, top_n, scc_index, include_content)
agents/tools/schema_validator.py: def print_report(file_path, schema_path, is_valid, errors, warnings)
agents/tools/user_task_builder.py: def validate_inputs(mode, objective, files, constraints, phase, validation_status, validated_by, validated_at)

_on_demand._note: Temporary on-demand data. NOT persisted to context.json.

architecture_metrics.name: architecture_metrics
architecture_metrics.description: Architecture metrics summary derived from dependency graph.

dependencies_graph.name: dependencies_graph
dependencies_graph.description: Canonical directed dependency graph for machine consumption.

treemap.name: treemap
treemap.description: Full recursive file tree of the host project.

## Cache Artifacts

- path_cache.json: single runtime cache file
- Host-specific or suffixed cache files are not supported
- Any additional cache files should be considered accidental artifacts
